mapper.update:
update T_SOD_PORTAL_USER
version = #{version},
password = #{password},
ischeck = #{ischeck},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select pu.* from T_SOD_PORTAL_USER pu left join T_SOD_PORTAL_USER ppu on pu.ORG_CODE_PATH like ppu.ORG_CODE_PATH + '%' where ppu.id = #{userId} order by pu.ORG_CODE_PATH;

select ppu.* from T_SOD_PORTAL_USER ppu where ppu.DEPTUNICODE in (select ppd.DEPTUNICODE from T_SOD_PORTAL_DEPART ppd start with ppd.deptcode = (select pd.deptcode from T_SOD_PORTAL_DEPART pd, T_SOD_PORTAL_USER pu where pd.DEPTUNICODE = pu.DEPTUNICODE and pu.id = #{userId}) connect by prior ppd.deptcode = ppd.parent_code)

select pu.* from T_SOD_PORTAL_USER pu left join T_SOD_PORTAL_USER_ROLE pur on pu.id = pur.USER_ID left join T_SOD_PORTAL_ROLE pr on pr.id = pur.ROLE_ID and pr.roleKey='business'
